divs: sighting detailsat around 1:05am on 10\09\08 i was outside walking my dog the sky very clear and even with light pollution from a street light and the big annoying light on my garage, i could see more stars then i have ever seen before. that in itself was amazing but as i got to the end of my driveway a ball of light seemed to come out of no ware it must have come from behind me i estimate it about 40 or 50 feet off the ground, anyway the ball of light speed past directly over me and went across the street over the house directly across from me and behind some trees, this ball of light moved so fast it seemed to have a tail. this whole episode lasted about 2 seconds, and as i am only human i could have easily misjudged the distance off the ground. also the ball of light did seem to have a mixture of a electric sound and a whoosh type sound, i don���������t know how else to explain the sound. also it seemed to me to be about the size of a basketball or a little larger. this moved from east to west
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Newton
There were no other sightings in Newton on or around October 9th 2008
